description: The 14-year-old, who cannot be named, pleaded guilty to having a knife on school grounds.
title: 'Bullied' Manx teen chased fellow student at school with knife
title_page: 'Bullied' Manx teen chased fellow student at school with knife - BBC News
maintext: The 14-year-old, who cannot be named for legal reasons, pleaded guilty to affray and having a knife on school grounds which he had taken from home.
